subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. has put new emphasis on a longstanding rule that prohibits players from holding the ball or redirecting it after a successful field goal. It is known as the delay-of-game penalty.
snippet: The N.B.A. has put new emphasis on a longstanding rule that prohibits players from holding the ball or redirecting it after a successful field goal. It is known as the delay-of-game penalty.
